ygData.subject: Re: RE: Umbral Messenger
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/16/99 11:55:00 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... version ... What will probably happen if you write it to your spell book, is that you will
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/16/99 11:55:00 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
jackal@... writes:

> Umbral Messenger does not still exist as that spell and Druid/Shaman
version
> of it were pulled from the game in beta. That was a bug or just some left
> over programming that you found it on a vendor. I guaruntee you the spell
> will not work.
>

What will probably happen if you write it to your spell book, is that you
will get shadow vortex in your book (I had umbral messenger scroll from
before they made the change, they made the change then I got 20th level,
scribed umbral messenger, and got shadow vortex. If you already have shadow
vortex it will tell you you already have that spell so can't scribe it.

Sonoroud Tomebinder.
